Module kivakit.settings
Package com.telenav.kivakit.settings

Interface SettingsTrait

All Superinterfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter
All Known Implementing Classes:
SettingsRegistry
public interface SettingsTrait extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater

A stateless trait for accessing the SettingsRegistry for the implementing component. Settings for a component can be retrieved with settingsForThis(). This provides a simplified interface to load settings objects specified by the user while also allowing for default settings when they are not specified. See SettingsRegistry for details.

Includes methods to look up, register and require settings objects. When there is more than one settings object of a given type, an InstanceIdentifier can be given to distinguish between instances. Convenience methods allow Enums to be used as identifiers as well. The Component> interface in kivakit-component uses this trait to add easy access to settings objects to all components.

Registry Access

  • settingsForThis()

Register methods

  • registerSettings(Object) - Registers the given object
  • registerSettings(Object, Enum) - Registers the given identified object instance
  • registerSettings(Object, InstanceIdentifier) - Registers the given identified object instance
  • registerSettingsIn(SettingsStore) - Registers the settings in the given folder with this settings object

Lookup methods

  • hasSettings(Class) - Determines if the registered instance of the given class can be found
  • hasSettings(Class, InstanceIdentifier) - Determines if the registered instance of the given class can be found
  • hasSettings(Class, Enum) - Determines if the registered instance of the given class can be found
  • lookupSettings(Class) - Locates the registered instance of the given class
  • lookupSettings(Class, Enum) - Locates the specified registered instance of the given class
  • lookupSettings(Class, InstanceIdentifier) - Locates the specified registered instance of the given class
  • lookupSettings(Class, InstanceIdentifier, ResourceFolder) - Locates the specified registered instance of the given class, or loads it from the given folder
  • requireSettings(Class) - Locates the registered instance of the given class or fails
  • requireSettings(Class, Enum) - Locates the specified registered instance of the given class or fails
  • requireSettings(Class, InstanceIdentifier) - Locates the specified registered instance of the given class or fails
  • settingsForThis() - The SettingsRegistry for this object

Loading

  • settingsIn(SettingsStore)
  • unloadSettings()

Saving

  • saveSettings(SettingsStore, Object)
  • saveSettings(SettingsStore, Object, Enum)
  • saveSettings(SettingsStore, Object, InstanceIdentifier)
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
